ComicInfo.Summary: Is this party over before it started? Never say never in NVRLND. With Wendy thrown off the roof, Peter unconscious on the back of Tink's motorcycle, and a whole gang of blood-thirsty pirates barreling down Mulholland Drive, it's hard to imagine this scene getting any worse. However, now that Hook has Peter's shadow, all bets are off. Meanwhile, Wendy's Police Chief father is hot on the trail of whoever has been producing the lethal batch of pixie dust. A meeting with The Savages will open a door to worlds unimagined, even by the likes of tinsel town!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-21 13:47:54. [CVDB553404]
ComicInfo.Characters: Captain Hook, Peter Pan, Wendy Darling
